org.jorlib.frameworks.columnGeneration.master.cutGeneration

Class CutGenerator<T extends ModelInterface,W extends MasterData>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jorlib.frameworks.columnGeneration.master.cutGeneration.CutGenerator<T,W>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of data model
    W - Type of MasterData
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SubtourInequalityGenerator

    public abstract class CutGenerator<T extends ModelInterface,W extends MasterData>
extends Object
    This class is used to separate valid inequalities. It can access data from the the master problem through a MasterData object. Each time inequalities have to be separated, the generateInequalities() method is invoked. Given the data from the master, the CutGenerator can then check whether there are any violated inequalities. Typically, one wants to store any inequalities generated for a particular master problem in the corresponding MasterData object such that the master problem has access to the inequalities.
    Version:
    13-4-2015
    Author:
    Joris Kinable

      • addCut

        public abstract void addCut(Inequality cut)
        Add an inequality of the type generated by this CutGenerator to the model. The inequality may have generated elsewhere, e.g. by a different node, or the user may provide an initial set of inequalities.
